name: Demon Pact: Soul Harvest
description:
Demon Pact: Soul Harvest is my entry for the ludum dare 52 compo (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/demon-pact-soul-harvest).

Source code is available here: https://bitbucket.org/dklf/ld52/

You play as a blood seeker demon hired by the devil to harvest souls. If you fail to kill humans in time YOU will die. If you fail to collect all souls, well, you will probably die.

Controls:

 - Move: Keyboard (WASD or arrow keys), Controller (Left joystick)

 - Dash: Mouse (Left button), Controller (A on XBOX, not sure for others)

How to play:

 - There are 4 levels, in each level you have to collect (dash through) every human

 - If you fail to collect any human during a short period of time, you will die from hunger (well you feed on blood, what did you expect).

Tools used:

 - Game: Unity 2021.3.15f1

 - Code: JetBrains Rider 2021.2.1

 - "Audio": Audacity 3.2.3 (everything was recorded during the jam)

 - "Art": Photopea (https://www.photopea.com/) (everything was drawn during the jam)

 - Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Outfit?query=outfit
